'''Cropsy''' is a character waiting for someone<ref name=cropsy>[https://web.archive.org/web/20161007092404/http://mojang.com/2016/10/eek-the-campfire-tales-skin-pack-creeps-onto-pocket-win-10-today/ EEK! CAMPFIRE TALES SKIN PACK HAUNTS POCKET / WIN 10!], written by Marsh Davies, October 5, 2016</ref> or something<ref name=cropsy/> and appears in the ''[[Minecraft Mini-Series]]''. Cropsy appeared as a skin in the [[Campfire Tales]] [[skin pack]] and a character in the ''[[Minecraft Mini-Series]]''.

== Appearance ==
Cropsy resembles a scarecrow, with [[hay bale|hay]] for arms and a [[melon]] as a head. Cropsy wears a brown robe with purple sleeves and an apron, possessing a melon-shaped head with a smile and a pair of eyes carved into it. Cropsy also wears a large purple hat with an orange stripe on top.

== Biography ==
In Episode 3, teams Mushroom, Mesa, Stone Beach, and Tundra arrive at the haunted farm, where they settle in until sunset. After sunset, Cropsy comes to life and hits Quinn with great force, then the heroes hide in the basement of the house until dawn, and Cropsy returns to the place and turns off.

== Power and Abilities ==
As shown in the series, Cropsy only comes to life at night, and switches off at dawn. Cropsy can hit with great force (for example, when Cropsy hit Quinn, she flew several meters and destroyed a wooden block with her body), and it is also unknown whether Cropsy can be defeated.
